tasks.title: Setup Project Repository
tasks.description: Initialize the project repository for TaskHero AI with the necessary configurations.
tasks.details: Create a new Git repository for TaskHero AI. Ensure that the initial commit includes the updated package.json, README.md, and other essential files. Set up branch protection rules and CI/CD pipelines if necessary.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify that the repository is correctly initialized and that all essential files are present.

tasks.title: Update Core Application Files
tasks.description: Change all instances of 'TaskMaster' to 'TaskHero' in core application files.
tasks.details: Perform a global search and replace for 'TaskMaster' with 'TaskHero' in package.json, README.md, README-task-master.md, index.js, and bin/task-master.js. Rename README-task-master.md to README-task-hero.md and update internal references accordingly.
tasks.testStrategy: Run the application to ensure that all references are updated and functional.

tasks.title: Update Configuration & Scripts
tasks.description: Revise configuration files and scripts to reflect the new branding.
tasks.details: Update all script files in the scripts/ directory, MCP server configurations in mcp-server/, source code comments and string literals in src/, and comments in .env.example to replace 'TaskMaster' with 'TaskHero'.
tasks.testStrategy: Check that all configurations load correctly and that scripts execute without errors.

tasks.title: Revise Documentation
tasks.description: Ensure all documentation files reflect the new branding of TaskHero AI.
tasks.details: Update all documentation files in the docs/ directory, including CHANGELOG.md and LICENSE, to replace 'TaskMaster' with 'TaskHero'.
tasks.testStrategy: Review documentation for consistency and accuracy, ensuring all references are updated.

tasks.title: Update CLI Commands & Help Text
tasks.description: Modify CLI command descriptions and help text to reflect the new branding.
tasks.details: Update all CLI command descriptions, help text, error messages, and user-facing strings to replace 'TaskMaster' with 'TaskHero'. Update banner/logo text in UI modules as well.
tasks.testStrategy: Test all CLI commands to ensure they function correctly with the new branding.

tasks.title: Revise Dependencies & External References
tasks.description: Update npm package name and any external references to TaskHero AI.
tasks.details: Change the npm package name in package.json from 'task-master-ai' to 'task-hero-ai'. Update any hardcoded URLs or references in the codebase and MCP configuration examples.
tasks.testStrategy: Publish the package to npm and verify that it is accessible under the new name.

tasks.title: Update Testing & Build Files
tasks.description: Revise test descriptions and build files to reflect the new branding.
tasks.details: Update test descriptions and assertions in the tests/ directory to replace 'TaskMaster' with 'TaskHero'. Modify jest.config.js if the project name is referenced. Ensure build and deployment scripts are updated accordingly.
tasks.testStrategy: Run all tests to confirm that they pass with the updated branding.

tasks.title: Conduct Functional Testing
tasks.description: Verify that all CLI commands work with the new names and branding.
tasks.details: Perform functional testing on all CLI commands to ensure they operate correctly with the new 'task-hero' command name.
tasks.testStrategy: Execute each CLI command and confirm that they return the expected results.

tasks.title: Perform Integration Testing
tasks.description: Test the integration of the MCP server with the new branding.
tasks.details: Conduct integration testing to ensure that the MCP server functions correctly with the updated configurations and branding.
tasks.testStrategy: Check the server logs for errors and verify that all integrations work as expected.

tasks.title: Finalize Documentation Review
tasks.description: Ensure all documentation is consistent and accurately reflects TaskHero branding.
tasks.details: Conduct a final review of all documentation to ensure that it is consistent and free of any references to 'TaskMaster'.
tasks.testStrategy: Have a peer review the documentation for accuracy and completeness.
